verses.name: 2 Kings 20:4
verses.text: And it came to pass, afore Isaiah was gone out into the middle court, that the word of the Lord came to him, saying,

verses.name: 2 Kings 20:5
verses.text: Turn again, and tell Hezekiah the captain of my people, Thus saith the Lord, the God of David thy father, I have heard thy prayer, I have seen thy tears: behold, I will heal thee: on the third day thou shalt go up unto the house of the Lord.
